message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product for $15000. It's truly a unique opportunity, and I believe it will be highly valuable for you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $14000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14000 is a bit low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $14500? I think this is a fair compromise given the value of this product. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still not able to pay more than $14000 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand you're sticking to $14000, but I'm really not comfortable going lower than $14250.  This is a very fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I am willing to pay $14100 for the product. I hope this is within your acceptable range.
